metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26143 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the ALFA Windows 10 driver 1030.36.604 forAWUS036ACH. The WEP, WPA, WPA2, and WPA3 implementations accept fragmentedplaintext frames in a protected Wi-Fi network. An adversary can abuse thisto inject arbitrary data frames independent of the network configuration.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
